full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender for Electronic Monitoring Systems and Services
=====================================

## For the Department of Fisheries and Oceans

## Solicitation Number: 30004414
## Amendment Number: 3
## Publication Date: June 2, 2023
## Tender Closing Date: June 19, 2023 at 1:00 PM AST
## Expected Contract Start Date: July 1, 2023
## Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the supply and installation of Electronic Monitoring (EM) equipment on participating vessels for field testing purposes.

## Background

In 2022, the Gulf Conservation and Protection team conducted a field study using modern camera technology to assess its suitability for replacement of dated camera technology used in the fishery. The study aimed to identify a system that is less labor-intensive for the Department and sustainable for fleet-wide implementation.

## Scope of Work

The contracting authority requires the services of a contractor to:

1. Supply and install EM equipment on participating vessels.
2. Monitor compliance with the Fisheries Act and applicable regulations.
3. Deploy two (2) systems on two (2) separate vessels during each of two (2) periods:
	* Period 1: July 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024
	* Period 2: July 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025

## Tender Requirements

* The selected contractor will be required to provide a detailed proposal that meets the requirements outlined in the request for proposal (RFP).
* The RFP can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website.

## Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications related to this tender, please contact Tina Brown, Procurement Officer, at:

* Email: [tina.brown@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:tina.brown@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Phone: (506) 238-3224

Note:
Please do not submit any proposals at this time. This invitation to tender is being issued to inform potential bidders of the upcoming RFP. The formal RFP will be issued in due course.
